name: BrandCrockTechElectoSW6

infos.name: Tech Electo
infos.description: The Tech Electo Theme is developed by BrandCrock GmbH and can be easily integrated with your Shopware 6 shop. Tech  Electo Theme is a customizable, simple and with elegant design. This theme is perfectly optimized for Desktop, Tablet and Smartphone therefore you can significantly increase your potential customer base.
infos.installationManual:
https://brandcrock.com/docs/sw_6.3.0.0-6.4.10.0_bc_TechElectoResponsiveTheme_1.0.3.pdf


BrandCrock Support

If you have any questions or inquiries, just get in touch with us: 

Support: support@brandcrock.com
Tel: +49 (0) 89 2154 7447

Web: https://www.brandcrock.com/

infos.highlights: Service Area in Header, Hover Effect on Images, Scroll to Top Button, Adjustable Language Selection, Free Support, Optimized Mobile Version, Sticky Navigation
infos.features:
Fully Responsive
Easy installation
Focus on usability
Customizable
Clean and Fast code

infos.name: Tech Electo
infos.description:
Das Tech Electo Theme wurde von der BrandCrock GmbH entwickelt und kann einfach in Ihren Shopware 6 Shop integriert werden. Das Tech Electo Theme ist anpassbar, einfach und mit elegantem Design.

Dieses Theme ist perfekt für Desktop, Tablet und Smartphone optimiert, so dass Sie Ihren potentiellen Kundenstamm deutlich vergrößern können.
infos.installationManual:
https://brandcrock.com/docs/sw_6.3.0.0-6.4.10.0_bc_TechElectoResponsiveTheme_1.0.3.pdf


BrandCrock Support

Wenn Sie Fragen oder Anfragen haben, nehmen Sie einfach Kontakt mit uns auf:: 

Support: support@brandcrock.com
Tel: +49 (0) 89 2154 7447

Web: https://www.brandcrock.com/

changelog.text:
-  Background image option in the header section

-  Icons color options in the header section

-  Optimized existing color settings

The version contains bug fixes and performance improvements

-  Additional theme configuration for whole pages

-  Certificate creation

-  Add Newsletter Section

-  Stylesheet optimization

-  Compatibility with different plugins
feature enhancement with social media and delivery icons in footer
